hero.headline: Smart Tech. Smarter Hosting.
hero.subheadline: Reliable access, 24/7 coverage, and intelligent systems that scale with your property—powered by SmartHoster's SmartTag platform and partners like Nuki and HOMINT.

multiLayeredAccess.title: Failproof Entry, Every Time.
multiLayeredAccess.description: At SmartHoster, we don't rely on a single method of check-in. Our three-layered access system ensures reliability no matter what:
features: Digital Smart Locks — via Nuki and HOMINT, integrated with guest reservations
Manual Lockboxes — as secure, offline backups
On-Call Staff — available 24/7 to assist with access, resolve issues, or open doors in person
multiLayeredAccess.conclusion: Whether a guest arrives at midnight, loses internet, or mistypes their code—access is guaranteed.

smartLocks.title: Contactless, Reliable, Automated
smartLocks.description: We partner with Europe's leading smart lock providers—Nuki and HOMINT—to bring fully digital access to your property. Each booking automatically generates a unique access code or digital key, sent to the guest just before arrival.
features: No physical keys
No coordination hassle
No guest left waiting at the door

buildingAccess.title: From the Street to the Suite
buildingAccess.description: For apartments and condominiums, our systems integrate with main entrance intercoms. That means your guests can enter the building and unit using the same phone-based key—no separate remotes, no buzzers, no confusion.
buildingAccess.conclusion: This is especially valuable in Lisbon, Porto, and other cities with layered access buildings.

lockboxes.title: Low-Tech. Still Smart.
lockboxes.description: Digital systems aren't infallible—and we plan accordingly. Every property includes a manual lockbox, discreetly installed and preconfigured as a secondary access point. Guests with issues can retrieve a traditional key as needed.
lockboxes.conclusion: We proactively rotate and maintain these as part of our system.

humanOversight.title: Real People. Real Time.
humanOversight.description: Our local team is always on-call, ready to:
features: Help guests who can't access a unit
Manually unlock units via secure app
Visit properties when needed, fast
humanOversight.conclusion: We combine automation with real presence—because peace of mind needs both.

smartTag.title: Beyond Access—Built for Reliability
smartTag.description: Our SmartTag platform is more than just locks. It includes smart scheduling and alert systems that automate your property's backend processes:
features: Automatically notifies cleaning staff after check-out
Triggers maintenance reminders for recurring services
Verifies check-in/check-out timing and access status
Syncs with booking calendars and property dashboards
smartTag.conclusion: The result? Fewer calls. Fewer surprises. Smoother operations.

portfolioManagement.title: One App. Any Door.
portfolioManagement.description: If you manage more than one property, SmartHoster makes it easy to control them all from one dashboard.
features: Grant or revoke access instantly
View activity logs
Coordinate service providers
Monitor guest arrival times across units

whyItWorks.title: Automation isn't about tech—it's about trust.
whyItWorks.description: Guests expect smooth, modern check-ins. Owners expect reliability. SmartHoster delivers both.
whyItWorks.subtitle: Our layered system ensures:
features: No lockouts
No missed check-ins
No service delays
And no guesswork for owners or guests
whyItWorks.conclusion: This leads to better reviews, more repeat bookings, and a stress-free hosting experience.

apartments.question: Can this system work in apartment buildings?
apartments.answer: Yes. Nuki and HOMINT both integrate with intercoms, giving guests access from the front door to the apartment.

malfunction.question: What if the lock stops working?
malfunction.answer: Each property includes a backup lockbox and 24/7 support staff to assist in real-time.

installation.question: Is installation included?
installation.answer: Yes—for clients on our full-service package, we provide installation at no added cost. For others, we offer a detailed quote after a free evaluation.

portfolio.question: How many properties can I manage at once?
portfolio.answer: As many as you like. Our dashboard scales to portfolios large and small.

finalCta.headline: Request Your Free Access Evaluation
finalCta.description: Want to automate access, avoid check-in issues, and modernize your rentals? Schedule your free on-site review today.
